website_summaries.verdict: Light and strong frame with a budget-friendly price tag for the perfect value purchase.
pros: Aluminum shell is strong and light, making it easy to move around and install on a truck
Side handles are comfortable to hold when carrying the toolbox for long periods of time
Roomy interior for holding all your tools
Comes with a lock and two keys
cons: Lid chain can break with normal toolbox use

customer_reviews.title: This box served it's purpose perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This box served it's purpose perfectly. I installed it on the rear of my RV for extra storage. I also added a gas shock lift rod to open and hold it open. I'll be ordering another one shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife Up Close

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff and sturdy once its mounted
customer_reviews.text: Other folks said the metal on the box was thin. Box came early, no damage even though the packing inside the cardboard consisted of some fairly thin plastic corner blocks. Lid opens and closes well, no alignment issues. Box is mounted through the bottom on an aluminum trailer. Very stiff and sturdy once its mounted. They could have put some weather stripping under the lip on top, but otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: EvilTwin

customer_reviews.title: Not just for trucks
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I have been seeking. I needed a sturdy box to store my garden tools and gloves on my tiny back porch. I dislike fake brown plastic storage and was delighted to realize I could something intended for pickup trucks. I added weather stripping and raised the corners with small flower pots.
customer_reviews.author: Cate F.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the tongue of our enclosed trailer. I installed a battery, switches and a trickle charger in the box. I still have room to hold more stuff. It matches the trailer really well. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Although it isnt a bad product, all of the edges were extremely jagged ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it isnt a bad product, all of the edges were extremely jagged and i had to file/sandpaper them down. Would of appreciated such things done before hand with the cost of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves the gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this as a tool box on his work truck and he loves it! It is slightly heavy, but you are getting what you pay for... a durable box for good tools to stay out of the weather and keep safe when parked.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for my purposes - field box for electronics in desert environment. easy to line with 2 in hard foam insulation and keep things cool.
customer_reviews.author: Red C

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and will do the job
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great box. I use it on my utility trailer and it fits perfectly mounted across the frame rails at the front of the trailer. I have had several comments about the great appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for the trailer hitch carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the trailer hitch carrier. It is the size I needed for items when I first set up camp. No more digging in the storage in back. I'd like a heavier gauge of aluminum but you get what you pay for. In this case it will be suitable.
customer_reviews.author: James Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Degrades Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Within 60 days of installation, the chrome on the side handles began to pit and rust. Not a little, a lot. The overall finish started dulling as well. Now five months in, it looks like the 20 year old aluminum tool box on my old truck. If you don't care how something looks and you are just looking for function, this will work just fine. I'm not happy with the appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Loose

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just what i ordered and was delivered WAY ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! Just what i ordered and was delivered WAY before the scheduled date. Perfect for the motorhome
customer_reviews.author: William Holton

customer_reviews.title: With a few modifications it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make a faraday cage. With a few modifications it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Works good for tools
customer_reviews.text: I use to keep all my cordless tools and charger in works fine for that
customer_reviews.author: Julieth

customer_reviews.title: Great size but a little to thin of metal for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size but a little to thin of metal for my expected usage. Great lock. Will work in non heavy duty workload. I was planning on using it on a trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Works great to store my straps on my UTV trailer
customer_reviews.text: Works great to store my straps on my UTV trailer. Drilled a few holes in the bottom for mounting.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fit perfectly in the back of my wolverine for storage.Added padded tape around lid for water proofing
customer_reviews.author: CSI PI

customer_reviews.title: It's watertight
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Box and put it on our boat trailer and it holds all of our goodies and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A. White

customer_reviews.title: OK quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my utility trailor/bike hauler. OK quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: RogerS1947

customer_reviews.title: Should have looked more
customer_reviews.text: Just not as heavy duty as I would have expected for underbody storage box
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool box for heavy equipment tools
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool box for heavy equipment tools. Love the handles and the lock. Very high quality and the price was unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Ramm

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price for this little box
customer_reviews.text: Perfect box for the back of my Jeep jk. Fits my windows rolled up and backpack because I don't trust the plastic locks in my interior dash/ center console. I took one star away though because I think it could use a thicker gauge metal and needs an optional bracket for your own lock
customer_reviews.author: scott parsons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was just as advertised. It was what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Sweat

customer_reviews.title: Nice toolbox.
customer_reviews.text: This toolbox did everything I needed it to do. Works well. Nice toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: paul pitman

customer_reviews.title: We have a winner!!!!! See my video review
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tool box. So many uses. See my video for my full review. I received the tools box in exchange for my video review.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Scheck

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 30in Aluminum Camper Tool Box w/Lock and 2 Keys - Silver
product_meta.description:
All-purpose storage for families, truck drivers, and outdoor enthusiasts. The sturdy aluminum construction and exterior chrome finish make this toolbox both long-lasting and an appealing part of your flatbed pickup. The roomy interior provides all the space you need for tools and accessories. It also features a lock and two keys for security. Store it in a vehicle, garage, or bring it on your next camping trip.

Specifications:
Overall Dimensions: 30”(L) X 13.75”(W) X 9.75”(H)
Weight: 11.55 lbs.
Color: Silver
Material: Aluminum
Assembly required (with hardware and instructions)
feature_bullets: Perfect all-purpose storage item to bring on outings or use at home for extra storage
Made of durable aluminum with a chrome finish to create a long-lasting, attractive storage unit
Roomy interior has plenty of space for tools, accessories, gear, and more
Includes a lock and 2 keys for added security

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
